General.Name: Induct AS
General.Description: Induct AS engages in the development of management software in Norway and internationally. It offers a digital platform, which helps to manage and collaborate on projects and contracts; and create discussion groups. The company's platform also provides access to video meetings, task management, file manager, document storage, news feeds, and chat area. It serves organizations, business owners, entrepreneurs, teachers, nurses, parents, students, and others. Induct AS was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Oslo, Norway.
